name: vscode-cosmosdb
description: Create, browse, and update globally distributed, multi-model databases in Azure.

scripts.package:win32: npm run webpack-prod && cd dist && npm pkg delete "scripts.vscode:prepublish" && npx vsce package --no-dependencies --out ../%npm_package_name%-%npm_package_version%.vsix
scripts.package:default: npm run webpack-prod && cd dist && npm pkg delete "scripts.vscode:prepublish" && npx vsce package --no-dependencies --out ../${npm_package_name}-${npm_package_version}.vsix
scripts.webpack-dev: rimraf ./dist && npm run webpack-dev-ext && npm run webpack-dev-wv
scripts.webpack-prod: rimraf ./dist && npm run webpack-prod-ext && npm run webpack-prod-wv
scripts.resapi.resetall: rimraf out node_modules dist && npm install && npm run resapi.link

commands.title: Create Database Server...
commands.detail: SQL or NoSQL databases for your web apps.

commands.title: Learn more about authenticating with Azure Active Directory

mongo.shell.path.description: Full path to folder and executable to start the Mongo shell, needed by some Mongo scrapbook commands. The default is to search in the system path for 'mongo'.

mongo.shell.args.description: Arguments to pass when starting the Mongo shell.

mongo.shell.timeout.description: The duration allowed (in seconds) for the Mongo shell to execute a command. Default value is 30 seconds.

azureDatabases.batchSize.description: The batch size to be used when querying Azure Database resources.

azureDatabases.useCosmosOAuth.markdownDescription: Always authenticate using Entra ID RBAC when connecting to Cosmos DB NoSQL Accounts. [Enable RBAC and assign Roles](https://aka.ms/cosmos-native-rbac).

azureDatabases.confirmationStyle.description: The behavior to use when confirming operations that cannot be undone, such as deleting resources.
enumDescriptions: Prompts with an input box where you enter the name of the resource to confirm deletion.
Prompts with a challenge where you select the correct number among multiple options to confirm deletion.
Prompts with a warning dialog where you click a button to confirm deletion.

azureDatabases.showOperationSummaries.description: Show detailed operation summaries, displaying messages for actions such as database drops, document additions, deletions, or similar events.

cosmosDB.documentLabelFields.description: The field values to display as labels in the treeview for Cosmos DB and MongoDB documents, in priority order

cosmosDB.emulator.mongoPort.description: Port to use when connecting to a CosmosDB Mongo Emulator instance

cosmosDB.emulator.port.description: Port to use when connecting to a CosmosDB Emulator instance

cosmosDB.enableEndpointDiscovery.description: Flag to enable/disable automatic redirecting of requests based on read/write operations.

cosmosDB.showSavePrompt.description: Show warning dialog when uploading a document to the cloud.
